column4: I just installed ubuntu(10.4) x64 on my girlfriends laptop, shes got a reliance usb modem (ZTEMT usb modem). I tried installing directly from the .deb package available on it but it said its on the wrong architecture, so i installed wvdial and followed the instructions given over here http://bit.ly/cajkQ3 which did not work and gives me the error warning:inherited section [modem0] doesn not exist in wvdial.conf and vwdialconf tells
Get a package for the correct architecture
thats not really possible, they dont support it
